Rockville.Newport Mill Middle School:
Newport Mill Middle School is a public school for students in grades 6, 7, and 8, located in Kensington, Maryland.
Newport Mill Middle School's students generally live in Kensington, Wheaton, and Silver Spring
Students who graduate from Rock View, Oakland Terrace, or Highland elementary schools may attend Newport Mill Middle School. Graduates of Newport Mill Middle School may attend Blair, Eintein, Kennedy, Northwood, or Wheaton high schools.
